translations: 杜罗（西班牙及通用西班牙语美洲国家值1比索的银元）
（Duro）人名；（英、德、意、西、葡、阿尔巴、尼日利）杜罗

sentences.sentence: The son of Luke Skywalker and his wife, Mara Jade Skywalker, he was born shortly after the Battle of Duro.
sentences.translation: 本·天行者出生在杜罗战役之后不久，是卢克·天行者和妻子玛拉·杰德·天行者的儿子。

sentences.sentence: When the Empire came into power and seized control of Duro, it began mining operations near the ancient Valley of Royalty.
sentences.translation: 帝国崛起后控制了杜罗星，开始在古老的“王族山谷”附近开采矿产。
